nodes.text: Del Rey is a science-fiction and fantasy imprint of Random House, beginning as an imprint of Ballantine Books in 1977. The imprint is responsible for most of Random House's science-fiction publications, including most of the Star Wars books (with the exception of novels published between 1991 and 1999, which are still reprinted as Bantam Spectra books).[source?]

In late June 2004, it renewed its contract with Lucas Licensing to extend its book licensing agreement through December 2008. Eventually, however, the company renewed its contract once more, and still continues to make Star Wars books to this day.[source?]
Del Rey has social media accounts under the label Star Wars Books that announces any news related to Star Wars books by Del Rey.
